name: Firefighters - A Tale of Champions
description:
Firefighters - A Tale of Champions is a game celebrating true heroes of our communities. Courageous firefighters who risk their lives to save our homes, our towns, our forests and ultimately our lives. 

Features

  • Dynamic, procedurally spreading fires
  • Custom fire extinguisher "gun"
  • Attenuated music and SFX based on the expansion of all fires
  • Co-op gameplay for 1-4 firefighters (mostly tested for solo-play)
  • Multiple levels with a sympathetic difficulty curve
  • Tutorial hints

https://launch.crayta.com/play/5eusxk56

Notes:

Some Voxel Assets from the community package "Houses and Buildings [I]" by Tumbak7  were used. Everything else solo-developed by me.
